doc.title: Peoplemovin.com
doc.plot: Welcome to Peoplemovin.com, a leader in America's transient workforce, more commonly known as temporary employment. A unique and irreverent look at New York's cubicle filled sweatshops. Agency Owner/President, Claire Upton, has put together a 6 minute training video designed to help you gain job satisfaction as a contingent employee. It includes practical advice for success in the world of freelance office support from Dana Clark, Peoplemovin.com's Temp of the Year.
